sys_openapi_operation.name: Returns a list of all assets of a given type.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Returns a list of all assets of a given type.","fOperationId":"getAssetsByTemplate","fDescription":"Returns a list of all assets of a given type. By default, only active assets are returned, and per asset, only the id of each asset is included. This is customizable through query parameters.

| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With read permission for the given asset type | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson9303172090","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/AssetResults","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The 'field' query parameter is used with a value that is not an id of a field on the asset template.
","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson1999118212","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/BadRequestEntity","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The specified asset template does not exist.
  • The specified asset template is archived.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"The template id specifying the type of assets to return.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateId7517149795","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"field","fDescription":"Which asset fields to include in the response. If not specified, only the id will be included. Fields should be referenced by their field id, not their display name.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"field3458786204","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"array","fProperties":[{"fName":"field3458786204","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},{"fName":"includeArchived","fDescription":"Whether to include archived assets in the response. sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Returns a list of all assets of a given type.
